title: Covid-19 live updates: AstraZeneca asserts no link between its vaccine and blood clots as more countries suspend use
content:
1. Covid-19 live updates: AstraZeneca asserts no link between its vaccine and blood clots as more countries suspend use  The Washington Post
  2. Ireland halts use of AstraZeneca vaccine following blood clot reports in Norway  CNN
  3. Ireland suspends Oxford-AstraZeneca Covid vaccine over blood clots - BBC News  BBC News
  4. There's no strong evidence the Oxford vaccine causes blood clots. So why are people worried?  The Guardian
  5. Why Europe may no longer be a COVID-19 infection barometer for the U.S.  Yahoo News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Covid-19 live updates: AstraZeneca asserts no link between its vaccine and blood clots as more countries suspend use  The Washington Post

localize.title: 科维德-19实时更新。阿斯利康宣称其疫苗与血栓之间没有联系，因为更多国家暂停使用疫苗
科維德-19實時更新。阿斯利康宣稱其疫苗與血栓之間沒有聯繫，因爲更多國家暫停使用疫苗
